name: Pocket Gal
description: This is a really fun pool game, but with a difference. The difference being that depending on what your score is after each frame, you might just be lucky enough to get one of four lovely pool-loving ladies to strip off for your gratification. Yes, it really is as sleazy as it sounds, and made all the more strange by the fact that in all other respects the game is a totally respectable, technically very enjoyable pool simulator.
